00028 class Autoloader {
00029         
00038         public static $directories = array();
00039         
00048         public static function addDirectory($dir) {
00049                 
00050                 $dirs = func_get_args();
00051                 foreach($dirs as $key => &$dir) {
00052                         if(!is_dir($dir)) throw new MissingDirectoryException($dir);
00053                         $dir = realpath($dir) . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR;
00054                         if(!is_dir($dir)) unset($dirs[$key]);
00055                         if(!is_readable($dir)) unset($dirs[$key]);
00056                 }
00057                 self::$directories = array_merge(self::$directories, $dirs);
00058                 
00059         }
00060         
00068         public static function autoload($className) {
00069                 
00070                 $fullName = $className;
00071                 $className = @end(explode('\\', $className));
00072                 $namespace = str_replace("\\$className", '', $fullName);
00073                 $file = Inflector::underscore($className) . '.php';
00074                 foreach(self::$directories as $dir) {
00075                         $search = "$dir$file";
00076                         if(file_exists($search)) {
00077                                 require_once $search;
00078                                 if(class_exists($fullName, false)) return;
00079                         }
00080                 }
00081                 
00082                 // If we reach here we haven't found the class, throw an exception.
00083                 throw new MissingClassException($fullName);
00084                 
00085         }
00086         
00087 }
00088 
00092 Autoloader::addDirectory('.');
00093 spl_autoload_register(array('\\MVCWebComponents\\Autoloader', 'autoload'));
00094 
00100 class MissingClassException extends MVCException {
00101         
00105         public function __construct($className) {
00106                 
00107                 $this->message = "Fatal error: could not find class <span style=\"color: #900\">$className</span>.  Search tree:<br/>";
00108                 $this->message .= str_replace(array("\n", ' '), array('<br/>', "&nbsp;"), print_r(Autoloader::$directories, true));
00109                 
00110         }
00111         
00112 }
00113 
00120 class MissingDirectoryException extends MVCException {
00121         
00129         public function __construct($dir) {
00130                 
00131                 $this->message = "No such directory `$dir`; Given to Autoloader::addDirectory().";
00132
